column8: Don't allow discussion of strong mayor powers as part of debate over provincial housing bill
column9: Don't oppose mayor using powers to win votes with less than a majority vote of council
column10: Do not refer "strong mayor" item to Executive Committee or allow public deputations
column11: Direct City Manager to develop 2023 Housing Action Plan, achieve or exceed 285K new home target
column12: Legalize and regulate multi-tenant homes (rooming houses) city-wide
column13: Do not declare homeless a public health crisis or direct staff to establish 24/7 indoor warming locations (instead, request report)
column14: Do not make midtown Yonge bike lanes permanent. Instead, extend pilot to Nov 2023
column15: Do not reduce police budget by $900K to fund warming centres
